name: Path M Pancreas Head
title: Pathologic M
notes:
**Note:**  The lesser sac of the peritoneum, or omental bursa, is the cavity in the abdomen formed by the lesser and greater omentum; the pancreas forms part of the posterior wall of the lesser sac.

        Suprapancreatic
